definition: any of numerous European and North American birds having pointed wings and a long tail, to repeat monotonously, like a cuckoo repeats his call
details:
noun
- any of numerous European and North American birds having pointed wings and a long tail
- a man who is a stupid incompetent fool
= synonyms: goose, jackass, twat, goof, goofball, bozo, fathead
verb
- to repeat monotonously, like a cuckoo repeats his call
